participant_1.background:
I spent quality time with my children and avoided the obligations of social obligations.
I enjoy capturing the beauty of Pittsburgh through my camera.
I played my guitar to my cat before bed last night.
i sew my own clothes.
I have never been in a fight, but I would defend myself if I had to.

participant_2.background:
My drum set is my most valued material possession because it is a reminder of my time in Japan and the adventures I had there.
I wish I knew where I belonged in the world, but my gummy worm collection is a comfort to me.
I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I know that they love me and I hope that they would accept me for who I am.
I'm a klutz, but I'm still proud of my comic book collection.
I remember summers spent playing in the creek with my friends.

content.text: Hey! I'm from Pittsburgh and I like to take pictures. What are you up to today?
I just finished playing the drums. I'm a bit of a klutz, but I'm proud of my collection of comic books.
That's awesome! Do you have any cool pictures? I've been trying to take more pictures of my children, but they're always moving around!
I have a few pictures of my gummy worm collection. I collect them because they're a comfort to me. I'm not sure where I belong in the world, but my gummy worms make me feel at home.
That's really sweet. I'm glad you have something to make you feel happy.
Thanks! I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I know that they love me and I hope that they would accept me for who I am.
I'm sure they would love and accept you for who you are. I'm proud of you for being brave enough to be yourself.
Thanks! I'm trying to be more open about my identity.
That's great! I'm here for you if you ever need someone to talk to.
